name: copyparty
description: Copyparty is a self-hosted file server that combines SFTP-like features with web-based uploads, browsing, and file management without dependencies. It is lightweight, supports drag-and-drop, and has built-in media players.
features: Web File Server: Upload and download files through browser interface. No client software needed.
Drag-and-Drop: Intuitive file uploads with drag-and-drop support. Effortless file sharing.
Media Players: Built-in audio and video players for streaming. Preview files instantly.
Zero Dependencies: Single binary with no external requirements. Deploy in seconds.
SFTP-Like Features: Advanced file management through web interface. Power user friendly.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for efficient operation. Perfect for any server.
